mapper.delete: delete from taskFamilyMonthAvgOrder where startDay=#{startDay} and endDay=#{endDay}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO taskFamilyMonthAvgOrder (avgScore,orderNo,month,familyId,taskFlag,taskStatus,failTimes,startDay,endDay) select averScore,0,month,familyId,0,0,0,startDay,endDay from familyScore where month=#{month} order by averScore desc
mapper.select: select * from taskFamilyMonthAvgOrder WHERE id<${id} and id>(${id}-10) and startDay=#{startDay} and endDay=#{endDay} order by id desc limit 1
mapper.update: UPDATE taskFamilyMonthAvgOrder SET taskStatus=-1,taskFlag=#{taskFlag},taskDealTime=now() WHERE taskStatus = 0 and taskFlag='0' and startDay=#{startDay} and endDay=#{endDay} LIMIT 500
mapper.select: SELECT * from taskFamilyMonthAvgOrder where taskStatus=-1 and taskFlag=#{taskFlag}
mapper.update: UPDATE taskFamilyMonthAvgOrder SET taskStatus=0,taskFlag='0',failTimes=failTimes+1 WHERE taskStatus=-1 and taskFlag<${compareTimes}
